title: De Soto National Memorial: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Guest Speakers The purpose of the National Park Service's (NPS) PIC program is to give schools the chance to allow students to experience an in- class fieldtrip. The PIC program is funded by federal grants and is offered free of charge to any educational institution, public or private, that wishes to participate. All Guest Speakers     Curriculum Materials De Soto National Memorial offers lesson plans to aid teachers in educating their classes about the environment and the De Soto expedition. These lesson plans were developed by teachers for teachers and adhere to Sunshine State Standards. They were designed for grades six through eight, but can be adapted for other grade levels. All Curriculum Materials
